turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Emily Carter. It's for my annual check-up.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help you with that. Do you have a preferred date or time in mind?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, this is always such a pain. I'm pretty flexible, but ideally sometime in the afternoon, next week. Any day but Wednesday.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check Dr. Carter's availability. Next week, excluding Wednesday... Okay, she has an opening on Monday at 2:30 PM, and Thursday at 3:00 PM. Which of those works best for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Thursday at 3:00 PM sounds good. Will this be a telehealth appointment, or do I need to come into the office?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: For annual check-ups, Dr. Carter prefers to see patients in person. Please arrive 15 minutes early to complete any necessary paperwork.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, in-person it is. One last question - will the flu shot be available then? I'd like to get it at the same time if possible.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, flu shots are currently available. I'll add a note to your appointment request. You should receive a confirmation email shortly with all the details. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
